name: Idle Hollywood Demo
description:
Welcome to Idle Hollywood!

GMAP-260 Digital Game Group Project Tester.

How to Play:

  • Move left, right, up, and down by using the arrow keys
  • Enter a building by pressing 'X'
  • Select an item by pressing 'Z'

Includes:

  • character moving around
  • ability to purchase items

Bugs/Not Included:

  • time
  • game loop
  • the item's effects
  • randomizing the items that are available
  • game art and design
